name: Flat Iron Hair Straightener with Aloe-Infused Ceramic Plates
categories: Hair, Tools, Hair Straighteners & Flat Irons
about: What it is:A one-inch, aloe-infused flat iron with ceramic-coated tourmaline plates to add shine and reduce frizz while straightening or curling hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Aloe nourishes hair during styling.What Else You Need to Know:Infused with nourishing aloe, this flat iron makes it so that you no longer have to feel guilty about hitting your hair with heat. Ionic technology reduces frizz and adds shine while ceramic-coated, floating tourmaline plates provide even heat distribution and an easy glide for silky-smooth results.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For a smooth style:.-Separate hair into small sections..-Smooth flat iron from root to ends...For waves:.-Separate hair into sections..-Smooth flat iron throughout hair, slowly rotating the tool as you move toward the ends. .-Let set, then run fingers through hair to loosen up the waves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off let me just say I love Bondiboost. This flat Iorn does not disappoint. I tend to have frizzy hair but this flat Iorn calms it when I want to straighten my hair. I will forever be a Bondiboost partner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best hair straightener i have used ever. it works so good with only one pass through my hair so my hair doesn‚Äôt get damaged!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I truly cannot understand the hype about this piece of garbage! I had been feeling unimpressed with my classic GHD iron and decided to give this a try. I used 370¬∞ which is a safe temperature and it did nothing for my hair. I have a thick, slightly wavy texture and that is the standard temp I use. Even the plates were kind of sliding back and forth - side to side. What a piece of junk! Stick with reputable brands and don't waste your money on this crap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this straigthener and the temp controls...the reason I took away a star is because I just am more in love with the BondiBoost Airburst Styler straigthener. It is a FAVORITE and I have used it almost daily since Fall 2023.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using it since August. Came back here to tell you that it works in Europe, too (with the adapter), even though it says here it doesn't. I took it to my vacation in Spain, because I can both straighten my hair extensions and curl them. No need to carry multiple hair stylers on your trip. I also love that it has a display, so I can be sure at which temperature it is operating... I even styled the bangs with it on my synthetic wig.

reviews.review_text: This straightener is the best I've ever had from the moment I opened the box. I usually have to warm up to a straightener, but this feels professional, doesn't pull and best of all....I live in TX and while our humidity is just starting, it seems to be keeping the frizz down a decent amount. My past straighteners have never helped with it at all (and I spent big money on the Dyson straightener last time). If you are in the market for a new straightener, definitely consider this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this straightener. I have very fine hair that's prone to frizz. The plates glide effortlessly and it heats up quick! I use it at a pretty low temperature, 240¬∞ and my hair looks smooth and shiny and feels very soft. I doubt the Aloe-Infused plates have anything to do with it as it sounds like a gimmick, but this flat iron is the best I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been searching for a replacement for my current hair straightener for well over a year. After trying different hair straighteners from Sephora (including the CHI), I think my search if finally over. This one checks off all the boxes for me - affordable price (especially when on sale), feels high quality in the hand, hair glides on the plates, heats up quickly, looks beautiful. I truly don‚Äôt have any qualms with it. Very happy I was able to clinch one before it sold out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: During the last sale I tried 2 different hair straighteners with no success. Even expensive options just did not really wow me. This product, low profile & great price point, has met my needs. The most remarkable thing about this iron is the speed at which it heats up. In a matter of maybe 2 minutes it‚Äôs hot & ready to go. Multiple levels of heat make it easy to adjust. Results will speak for themselves.

reviews.review_text: This straightener is absolutely amazing! It left my hair so soft and full of shine! I previously had the GHD Platinum, and I thought it was really good, but this is WAY BETTER! I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! My hair is medium thick and has a wave to it and this makes it nice and smooth straight! I would highly recommend! No wonder it is always out of stock!   I have also tried to T3, CHI, GHD, DRYBAR, AVANTI and this one destroys them all!

reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this flat iron. It straightens my hair with two passes at the most. I‚Äôve tried almost  every high end straightener and this one is by far the best. I am so happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_title: This hair straightener is a new FAV
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair straightener is a NEED it glides through your hair so smoothly and left my hair feeling soft and NOT dry! It‚Äôs definitely worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use a straightener on a daily basis so I was super excited to try this out and it did not disappoint! It really does glide on your hair, more than any other straightener that I've tried. The shine after using is great, I didn't even add any finishing products after my first use and my hair looked so silky and shiny. I especially like to use my straightener to put curls/waves into my hair and this works great, I can slide it down my hair length in one movement without any pulling. Even though I have naturally straight hair, I do sometimes like to still run a straightener through to smooth it out or put a little flip at the ends. This one tool does all of that! The super fast heat-up is great, sometimes you need a quick touchup and don't have time to wait for the tool to fully heat up. I like that the buttons are on the inside so that I don't accidently shut it off or change the temp. And the variable temperature control means I can use this on my real hair or even to touchup wigs for cosplay events and not damage them. I'm so happy to add this to my hair toolbox, I feel like it's going to speed up my morning routine! One of the photos is after I used it for waves and the second is after I straightened the waves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing it presses my hair so well and keeps my curls tight it‚Äôs an amazing product and I totally recommend

All I used was the heat protector spray and I didn‚Äôt even have to go over any strands a second time. It‚Äôs a slim beautiful straightener that gets the job done. I love this!!! I added my photos, ignore the dead ends please lol

reviews.review_text: Goodbye, frizz .. Hello straight Shiny hair! Best flat iron I ever used. Heats up fast. Glide through the hair so smoothly. You can also curl your hair with it, and it doesn't snag the hair. BondiBoost got it right with this one! I 100% recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smooths, it glides, it doesn‚Äôt tug! What more can you want? This is my new go to straightener. It keeps my hair silky smooth with the added benefit of aloe! Just buy it, you won‚Äôt regret it!
